reasoning: Inflammatory myofibroblastic tumor (IMT) of liver is extremely rare benign lesion with <50 cases reported in literature. Estimated <0.01 per 100k. Typically discovered incidentally on imaging. Low confidence due to limited epidemiological data; most information from case reports.
source: Coffin CM et al. (2007). Inflammatory myofibroblastic tumor: clinicopathologic review. Am J Surg Pathol. 31(4):509-520
